text: Claremont (ward) is an electoral ward of Salford, England. It is represented in Westminster by Rebecca Long-Bailey MP for Salford and Eccles. A profile of the ward conducted by Salford City Council in 2014 recorded a population of 10,166. == Councillors == The ward is represented by three councillors: Neil Reynolds (Lab), Mike Pevitt (Lab),
